chessboard

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessboard.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the game board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SQUARES_PER_SIDE
      The number of squares per one side of a chess board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(java.util.List<Piece> initialPieces, Color active)
      Constructor which initializes the piece array to the initial chess board.

      • SQUARES_PER_SIDE

        public static final int SQUARES_PER_SIDE
        The number of squares per one side of a chess board.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(java.util.List<Piece> initialPieces,
             Color active)
        Constructor which initializes the piece array to the initial chess board. Defaults to the initial chess state if no list of pieces is passed in.
        Parameters:
        initialPieces - the initial pieces to add to the board
        active - the player whose turn it is

    • Method Detail

      • inBounds

        public static boolean inBounds(int x,
                               int y)
        Method which checks whether a given co-ordinate is on the board.
        Parameters:
        x - the x co-ordinate to check
        y - the y co-ordinate to check
        Returns:
        true if the passed position is within bounds, false otherwise

      • initialState

        public static java.util.List<Piece> initialState()
        Method which returns the pieces necessary to set up the pieces for a normal game.
        Returns:
        a list of Pieces that are on a regularly setup chessboard

      • canCastle

        public boolean canCastle(Direction direction,
                         Color kingColor)
        Method which checks whether the active player can castle, which should be true only if neither the king nor the left rook has moved, the king is not in check, and the space to the side of the king is not under threat, and none of the spaces required are occupied.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction in which to castle; must be east or west
        kingColor - the color of the king trying to castle
        Returns:
        true if the active player can castle left, false otherwise

      • findKing

        public King findKing(Color color)
        Helper method which locates the king of a specific color.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of king to locate
        Returns:
        the requested King

      • getActivePlayer

        public Color getActivePlayer()
        Method which returns the player whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        the color whose turn it is

      • passTurn

        public void passTurn()
        Method which changes control of the turn to the next player.

      • kingThreatened

        public boolean kingThreatened(King toCheck)
        Method which checks the current board state for the king being threatened. This is used to determine move validity.
        Parameters:
        toCheck - the King whose safety should be checked
        Returns:
        true if the king is under threat, false otherwise

      • occupant

        public Piece occupant(int xPosition,
                      int yPosition)
        Method which returns the occupant of the given position.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - the x position to check
        yPosition - the y position to check
        Returns:
        the Piece at the passed position

      • setOccupant

        public void setOccupant(int xPosition,
                        int yPosition,
                        Piece occupant)
        Sets the occupant of the given position to the passed Piece.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - the x position to set
        yPosition - the y position to set
        occupant - the Piece to set in the position

      • lastMove

        public GenericMove lastMove()
        Method which returns a list of past moves made on the board.
        Returns:
        a list of past moves made on the board

      • removeLastMove

        public void removeLastMove()

        public void addToHistory(GenericMove move)

      • validMoves

        public java.util.List<GenericMove> validMoves()
        Method which returns a list of possible moves from this board state.
        Returns:
        a list of possible moves from this board state

      • resetValidMoves

        public void resetValidMoves()
        Method which resets the list of possible moves, which will force recalculation.
